item.title: Nifty Small Cap 250 - Stocks Performance
item.description: Indian stock market is in huge turmoil for last 18 to 20 months. Investors have seen lot of wealth erosion. As per majority of the super investors, they have never seen wealth erosion of this magnitude in history.
